```{r}
#| label: gene-pathways
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

make_pathway_list(input = input_report) %>%  #defined in setup
  gt::gt() %>% 
  gt::cols_hide(columns = c(data, count)) %>% 
  gt::cols_label(
    pathway = "Pathway", 
    go = "GO", 
    def = "Description"
  )

```
  
The pathway list shows Gene Ontoloty (GO) pathways that are annoated as containing `r input_report$content`.
